item.title: Xenomorph Blog: Putting the F# in Finance with TimeScape
item.description: Quick thank you to Don Syme of Microsoft Research for including a demonstration of F# connecting to TimeScape running on the Windows Azure cloud in the F# in Finance event this week in London. F# is functional language that is ...

item.title: On Excel Interoperation with F - fbmnds.clojure.blog - Blogger
item.description: Digging into the Excel interoperation facilities of F#, example code like F# 3.0 Sample Pack, FSSnip.net and projects like Excel F# Type Provider and Excel-DNA are first entry points for the topic. .... Porting Functional Code from Clojure to F#.

item.title: NDC London - are you ready? - MSDN UK Team blog - Site Home ...
item.description: The MSDN UK Blog is your central resource for Microsoft developer tools, news, downloads, trials, tutorials and events including windows phone, cloud, azure, desktop development and much more. ... Don is a Principal Researcher at Microsoft and an F# community contributor. He is an advocate of "data–rich, functional–first programming" with a focus on simplicity, correctness and robustness of code. Talk: Making Magic: Combining Data, Information, Services and Programming, ...
